name: SUPERPOSITIONIZER
description:
SUPERPOSITIONIZER

A short and sweet proof-of-concept for a mechanic inspired by quantum superposition. It's very simple: there are boxes, slots, and doors. Get the right boxes in the right slots, and the doors open. But once you get the gun, it gets a little more complicated -- split boxes up, collapse them together, and get to the end.

Made in 48 hours by Noah Kuhn for Texas Game Jam 2022.

Playable with keyboard + mouse or gamepad:
WADS/left stick: move
Mouse/right stick: look around
Spacebar/south button: jump
Left mouse button/Right trigger: use gun
